fieldHint.hint1: Ex: investing, calcium, golf, weight loss, supplements, get in shape, heart health, etc.
Ex: investors, home sellers, golfers, public speakers, funnel hackers, doctors, body builders, lonely men, etc.
Ex: stock market, physical fitness, public speaking, ebook marketing, pornography addiction, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Action they need / want to take

fieldHint.hint2: "I really need to ______, but I'm not sure how to do it."

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: buy gold, write a book, fix your golf swing, run facebook ads, exercise, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Big payoff or benefit they really want

fieldHint.hint2: "If I could _______, that would be AMAZING!"

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: beat the market, improve your golf score, invest in precious metals, sell more from the stage, etc.

fieldHint.hint1: Can be a person, place, or thing.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Realtors, investment advisers, stage fright, inflation, a wicked slice, bright shiny object syndrome, etc.
